Once the [[M-Day]] passed, the agency had very few work remaining.{{r|Heroic Age: X-Men #1}}

During [[San Francisco]]'s [[Utopia (Event)|riots]], they tried to defuse the conflict between the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] and [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Osborn]], only to be shut down by the [[H.A.M.M.E.R. (Earth-616)|H.A.M.M.E.R.]].{{r|Heroic Age: X-Men #1}}
